mapper.select: SELECT tc.teachClassID As teachclassid, tc.`name` AS teachclassname, tc.startDate AS startdate, tc.endDate AS enddate, c.name AS coursename, nsc.credit AS credit, cg.collegeName AS collegename, nsc.studentnumber AS teachclasscapacity FROM teachclass AS tc, course AS c, college AS cg, teacher AS t, (SELECT sc.teachClassID AS teachclassid, COUNT(*) AS studentnumber, sc.credit AS credit FROM scorerecord AS sc GROUP BY sc.teachClassID, sc.credit) AS nsc WHERE tc.teachClassID = nsc.teachclassid AND tc.courseID = c.courseID AND c.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND t.teacherID = tc.teacherID AND t.teacherID = #{techerID}

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, sc.score AS score FROM scorerecord AS sc, student AS s, adminclass AS ac, acsnamelist AS acs, college AS cg, major AS m WHERE sc.teachClassID = #{teachClassID} AND sc.studentID = s.studentID AND ac.adminClassid = acs.adminclassid AND acs.studentid = s.studentID AND cg.collegeID = m.collegeID AND ac.majorid = m.majorid

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, l.date AS `date`, l.section AS `section`, ar.type AS `type` FROM teachclass AS tc, tcsnamelist AS tl, student AS s, adminclass AS ac, acsnamelist AS al, major AS m, college AS cg, absencerecord AS ar, lesson AS l WHERE tc.teachClassID = #{teachClassID} AND tc.teachClassID = tl.teachClassID AND s.studentID = tl.studentID AND s.studentID = al.studentid AND al.adminclassid = ac.adminClassid AND m.majorid = ac.majorid AND m.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND ar.studentID = s.studentID AND ar.lessonID = l.lessonID

SELECT c.classroomID AS classroomid, c.capacity AS capacity, cr.date AS `date`, cr.section AS `section`, u.role AS role, cr.`check` AS `check` FROM classroomrecord AS cr, classroom AS c, `user` AS u WHERE cr.user = u.username AND c.classroomID = cr.classroomID AND u.username = #{teacherID}

SELECT tc.`name` AS teachclassname, c.`name` AS coursename, l.date AS lessondate, l.section AS lessonsection, tc.startDate AS tcstartdate, tc.endDate AS tcenddate FROM teachclass AS tc, lesson AS l, course AS c WHERE tc.teacherID = #{teacherID} AND tc.courseID = c.courseID AND tc.teachClassID = l.teachClassID order by l.date asc

SELECT tc.`name` AS teachclassname, c.`name` AS coursename, l.date AS lessondate, l.section AS lessonsection, tc.startDate AS tcstartdate, tc.endDate AS tcenddate FROM tcsnamelist AS tcl, teachclass AS tc, lesson AS l, course AS c WHERE tcl.studentID = #{teacherID} AND tcl.teachclassID = tc.teachclassID AND tc.courseID = c.courseID AND tc.teachClassID = l.teachClassID order by l.date asc

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, l.lessonID AS lessonid, l.date AS `date`, l.section AS `section`, lr.state AS state, lr.reason AS reason FROM teachclass AS tc, tcsnamelist AS tl, student AS s, adminclass AS ac, acsnamelist AS al, major AS m, college AS cg, leaverecord AS lr, lesson AS l WHERE tc.teachClassID = #{teachClassID} AND tc.teachClassID = tl.teachClassID AND s.studentID = tl.studentID AND s.studentID = al.studentid AND al.adminclassid = ac.adminClassid AND m.majorid = ac.majorid AND m.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND lr.studentID = s.studentID AND lr.lessonID = l.lessonID;

SELECT s.studentID AS studentid, s.`name` AS studentname, cg.collegeName AS collegename, m.`name` AS majorname, ac.grade AS grade, ac.classnumber AS classnumber, l.lessonID AS lessonid, l.date AS `date`, l.section AS `section`, lr.state AS state, lr.reason AS reason FROM student AS s, acsnamelist AS al, adminclass AS ac, major AS m, college AS cg, leaverecord AS lr, lesson AS l WHERE s.studentID = al.studentid AND al.adminClassid = ac.adminclassid AND ac.majorid = m.majorid AND m.collegeID = cg.collegeID AND l.lessonID = lr.lessonid AND lr.studentid = s.studentID AND lr.studentid = #{studentID} AND lr.lessonid = #{lessonID}
